short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A powerful Image Cropping tool for Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cropmate is a user-friendly Chrome extension that allows you to easily crop images directly from your browser. Whether you're editing images for social media, a presentation, or just for fun, Cropmate makes the process simple and efficient.

ü¶Ñ Features
- Easy Image Cropping: Select and crop any image on a webpage with a few clicks.
- Download Cropped Images: Save your cropped images directly to your device.
- Resizable and Movable Crop Area: Adjust the crop area to the exact size and position you need.
- Social Media Presets: Apply a list of aspect ratio presets to image based on popular social media platforms.
- User-friendly Interface: Clean and intuitive design for a seamless user experience.

üì¶ Installation
- Download the Extension: Get the latest version of Cropmate from the Chrome Web Store.
- Add to Chrome: Click the "Add to Chrome" button and follow the prompts to install the extension.

üïπÔ∏è Usage
- Activate Cropmate: Go to the extension manager and activate the cropping tool.
- Select an Image: Hover over the image you want to crop, open the contextual menu, and click "Open in Cropmate".
- Adjust Crop Area: Drag the edges or corners of the crop area to resize, or click and drag inside the crop area to move it.
- Crop and Save: Once you're satisfied with the selection, click the "Crop Image" button to crop the image and download it to your device.

ü§ù Support
If you encounter any issues or have any questions, contact the author at mail.sayf@yahoo.com.

üìú License

Thank you for using Cropmate! Happy cropping! üé™
